text: Hello, we have created a custom email module that allows you to select a blog within the portal and then type in the name of the blog post and it fully renders in the email. The issue we are running into is that the CSS is also being pulled which looks way too big in the email. Does anyone have any suggestions on how to resolve this?
since we don't have access to the email `head` in the drag-and-drop editor, this doesn't do the trick
Hi guys. I have a question about emails in a Custom Object. Is there a way to silo emails in a custom object for each user?
